document.title: The LAISEANG corpus
document.intro: The geographical region of insular South East Asia and New Guinea is well-known as an area of mega-biodiversity. Less well-known is the extreme linguistic diversity in this area: over a quarter of the world’s 6000 languages are spoken here. As small minority languages, most of these wil... LAISEANG: 52 Collections of South-east-asian language material
